name: Princess Spa & Body Massage
description:
Do you love beauty games and want to be a beautician ?
If your daughter want to play in the best Spa you have found the right educational game !

Every princess likes to go to massage parlors to relax the body !
The princess want to take a bath, a full-body massage, then a skin spa !
Completely relax yourself, so that you become the most beautiful princess !
Play in this fabulous spa center for unforgettable moments of total relaxation !

Princess Spa & Body Massage is simple and fun :
* Open the game and choose between back or legs
* give a relaxing full body massage
* in the Princess Back SPA you can give a healing hot stone massage
* massage with oils, emulsion to give amazing relaxation massage session
* give a leg massage
* relax and shaving legs
* at the end you can even do tattoos on legs and back
* tap the arrow button to change scene

Can you help this adorable princess in this spa game ?
Let's go to this famous Princess Back SPA shop, enjoy a comfortable massage and experience the royal treatment.

Princess Spa & Body Massage is a must have app for girls and women too. Features:
-entertaining and educational game
-Try on incredible massage techniques and oil massage
-Learn how to make a fabulous relaxation massage in this cute spa game
-tattoo the best tattoos on her back and legs
-In the final Paint view you can even design your princess !

Play with the best Makeover game and salon games, become the prettiest masseuse fashion princess in the world!
And after spa, Dressing up as the most elegant princess in the kingdom !

Have fun with BATOKI !
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
